summary: How to copy zip to sdcard/osmdroid

comments.content:
Hello

I created a map with Mobile Atlas Creator as Osmdroid Zip format.
Then i have copied the zip file in the assets directory of my project.
now i need a class to copy the zip file in /sdcard/osmdroid but i can't find a good class on the web to solve my problem.
Can someone help me?
Thanks

Daniel
Please ask questions in the forum http://groups.google.com/group/osmdroid
